cause.description:
anyone who thinks the money you give to unicef, united way etc is actually feeding people in those loser countries are douchebags.. (this means you)
1. those starving kids make enough money from doing those commercials..
cause.mission: make a load of $$$.. oh, i mean help the poor.. good thing they dont have the internet. hahaha
cause.name: UNICEF puts the profit back into non-profit (not that it went anywhere)
